tweet: Let me not to the marriage of true minds admit inpediments. Love is not love which alters when it alteration finds. - Shakespeare
Celebrate everything.  Our time here is limited. Don't waste time on anger.  Celebrate all the good. All the time.
Sometimes life gets messy.  Often life gets messy.     So clean it up already, and get on with it.
In Yoga as in life, it is good to STRETCH.  Are you STRETCHING?
Never forget your true friends.  They are there.  They always will be there.  Make friends first, then lovers.
